title: Print, "Plate in Nouveaux livres de peintures de salles et d’escaliers (New Books on Paintings for Rooms and Stairs)", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower margin: D. Marot invente et fecit auec Preuillege des Etats genraux des Provinces U'nie
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Atrium-like structure with stairs leading below. Large fountain with satyrs and putti in an apsed space. Wall decorated with urns, portrait busts and scenes in relief. Figures on clouds float above.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Plate in Nouveaux livres de peintures de salles et d’escaliers (New Books on Paintings for Rooms and Stairs)", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and engraving on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-40.
